summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hub Management System - both backend APIs and frontend UI functionality tested successfully. System is working well with minor issues.

minor_bugs.issue: JSON parsing error when creating records - likely empty response body

passed_tests: Hub detail pages showing 8 categories each
Asistencias (attendance) page loading and displaying Excel-like table
Attendance cell editing (1=worked, D=rest, IN=absent, E=sick, O=others)
Add employee dialog opening and form submission
Empty state handling when no employees exist
Hub navigation between different locations working
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix JSON parsing issue in records creation endpoint - ensure proper response format is returned. All core attendance functionality is working correctly.
